messages.subject: unschoolers and college
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/12/02 9:12:06 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:  Yep, that s the one. I was
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/12/02 9:12:06 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< She has a new site >>

Yep, that's the one. I was sending people the links to her old site, but when
she moved I saved the new addy and have been sending people there ever since.
She makes a great poster child!! lol
Looking forward to the book.

Ren
